title: The Physics of Superheroes, the Sequel
description: Holy Δx Δp ≥ ℏ/2 Batman! Theoretical physicist Michio Kaku joins us for another discussion of superheroes and the amazing physics behind their incredible powers.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
